summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Housing and Human Services, amending Ordinance 117472 to require that earnings from the investment of funds in the REACH General Subfund shall accrue to that Subfund, appropriating such interest to support administrative costs of the REACH Program; modifying the Table of Funds shown in Chapter 5.76 of the Municipal Code; and ratifying and confirming prior acts, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
